project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement command-line interface to accept user input for the temperature and desired output unit
Handle invalid user inputs and provide helpful error messages
Write tests for the conversion logic and command-line input handling
Execute tests to verify that the conversion and input handling function correctly
